name: ReplayLearn
tagline: Revisit concepts you struggled with, or simply start again from scratch
target_market: Returning learners who paused a course and want to start over fresh, and Mastery-driven learners who completed a course but wish to repeat it for reinforcement
core_features: Course progress reset functionality to restart or repeat material easily

hypotheses_to_test.description: Users will utilize the course progress reset feature when returning to previously paused or completed courses.
hypotheses_to_test.assumption: Returning and mastery-driven learners perceive value in restarting courses from the beginning, enabling engagement and reinforcement.

hypotheses_to_test.description: The reset feature will increase learner satisfaction and likelihood of course completion or repetition.
hypotheses_to_test.assumption: Users who can easily reset or repeat courses will feel more in control and positive about their learning experience, leading to higher satisfaction.

hypotheses_to_test.description: Providing a progress reset feature will offer a competitive advantage compared to platforms without such functionality.
hypotheses_to_test.assumption: Learners see the ability to reset progress as a differentiator and are more likely to choose (or recommend) ReplayLearn over alternatives.
